20110109180339.000|20110109180340.000|TR0|at one point for reasons which aren't 
20110109180340.000|20110109180342.000|TR0|entirely clear.
20110109180342.000|20110109180344.000|TR0|

20110109180423.000|20110109180424.000|TR0|our two agencies, but all state and local 
20110109180424.000|20110109180426.000|TR0|and federal agencies involved in this

20110109180441.000|20110109180443.000|TR0|
20110109180443.000|20110109180444.000|TR0|MUELLER:  Thank you, Sheriff, and good 
20110109180444.000|20110109180446.000|TR0|morning, everyone.  First, let me express 
20110109180446.000|20110109180448.000|TR0|my condolences to the families and the 
20110109180448.000|20110109180450.000|TR0|friends of representative Gabrielle 
20110109180450.000|20110109180452.000|TR0|Giffords, Judge John Roll, and the other 
20110109180452.000|20110109180454.000|TR0|victims of this senseless tragedy.  This 
20110109180454.000|20110109180455.000|TR0|was an attack not only against dedicated 
20110109180455.000|20110109180457.000|TR0|public servants, but against our fellow 
20110109180457.000|20110109180459.000|TR0|citizens, one being a child who was there 
20110109180459.000|20110109180501.000|TR0|to learn more about how our government 
20110109180501.000|20110109180503.000|TR0|works.  Other members of the community who 
20110109180503.000|20110109180505.000|TR0|were meeting with their elected officials 
20110109180505.000|20110109180506.000|TR0|for the first time, or who were simply 
20110109180506.000|20110109180508.000|TR0|running errands on what otherwise would 
20110109180508.000|20110109180510.000|TR0|have been an ordinary weekend.
20110109180510.000|20110109180512.000|TR0|
20110109180512.000|20110109180514.000|TR0|This was an attack on our institutions, an 
20110109180514.000|20110109180516.000|TR0|attack -- and an attack on our way of 
20110109180516.000|20110109180517.000|TR0|life.  As you know, Jared Lee Loughner was 
20110109180517.000|20110109180519.000|TR0|subdued by brave, quick-thinking 
20110109180519.000|20110109180521.000|TR0|individuals at the scene.  He was taken 
20110109180521.000|20110109180523.000|TR0|into custody by sheriff's deputies and is 
20110109180523.000|20110109180525.000|TR0|now in federal custody.  And formal 
20110109180525.000|20110109180527.000|TR0|charges are expected this afternoon.  
20110109180527.000|20110109180528.000|TR0|Federal agents and deputy sheriffs are 
20110109180528.000|20110109180530.000|TR0|working around the clock to learn as much 
20110109180530.000|20110109180532.000|TR0|as possible, gather the facts, determine 
20110109180532.000|20110109180534.000|TR0|why someone would commit such a heinous 
20110109180534.000|20110109180536.000|TR0|act, and whether anyone else was involved.
20110109180536.000|20110109180538.000|TR0|
20110109180538.000|20110109180539.000|TR0|And while we do not yet have all the 
20110109180539.000|20110109180541.000|TR0|answers to these questions, I can assure 
20110109180541.000|20110109180543.000|TR0|you that teams of professionals are 
20110109180543.000|20110109180545.000|TR0|working toward a single goal, and that is 
20110109180545.000|20110109180547.000|TR0|to piece together the facts, answer those 
20110109180547.000|20110109180549.000|TR0|questions, and ensure that justice is 
20110109180549.000|20110109180550.000|TR0|done.  We are working closely with the 
20110109180550.000|20110109180552.000|TR0|Pima County Sheriff's Office, the U.  S.   
20110109180552.000|20110109180554.000|TR0|Marshal Service, the U.  S. Capitol 
20110109180554.000|20110109180556.000|TR0|Police, and others in this ongoing 
20110109180556.000|20110109180558.000|TR0|investigation.  And given this tragedy, 
20110109180558.000|20110109180559.000|TR0|all logical precautions are in place to 
20110109180559.000|20110109180601.000|TR0|best ensure the safety of other public 
20110109180601.000|20110109180603.000|TR0|officials.  But I will say, and will 
20110109180603.000|20110109180605.000|TR0|emphasize, there is no information at this 
20110109180605.000|20110109180607.000|TR0|time to suggest any specific threat

20110109180609.000|20110109180610.000|TR0|

20110109180747.000|20110109180749.000|TR0|

20110109180751.000|20110109180753.000|TR0|possibility of someone, maybe not another 
20110109180753.000|20110109180755.000|TR0|shooter, but someone who may have assisted 
20110109180755.000|20110109180757.000|TR0|or participated directly or indirectly 
20110109180757.000|20110109180758.000|TR0|with the shooting (OFF-MIKE) device or 
20110109180758.000|20110109180800.000|TR0|something like that?  And secondly, what 
20110109180800.000|20110109180802.000|TR0|would the formal charges be likely against 
20110109180802.000|20110109180804.000|TR0|Mr.   Loughner?
20110109180804.000|20110109180806.000|TR0|
20110109180806.000|20110109180808.000|TR0|MUELLER:  Okay, as to the -- the first

20110109181543.000|20110109181545.000|TR0|MUELLER:  I think it's premature to say to 
20110109181545.000|20110109181547.000|TR0|what extent -- to what -- what the 
20110109181547.000|20110109181548.000|TR0|motivations were of the individual on this 
20110109181548.000|20110109181550.000|TR0|particular case, and to necessarily draw 
20110109181550.000|20110109181552.000|TR0|generalizations off of that.  I will say, 
20110109181552.000|20110109181554.000|TR0|whether it's international terrorism or 
20110109181554.000|20110109181556.000|TR0|domestic terrorism, the ubiquitous nature 
20110109181556.000|20110109181558.000|TR0|of the internet means that not only 
20110109181558.000|20110109181559.000|TR0|threats, but hate speech and other 
20110109181559.000|20110109181601.000|TR0|insightful speech is much more readily 
20110109181601.000|20110109181603.000|TR0|available to individuals than quite 
20110109181603.000|20110109181605.000|TR0|clearly it was eight or 10 or 15 years ago.
20110109181605.000|20110109181607.000|TR0|
20110109181607.000|20110109181609.000|TR0|And that absolutely presents a challenge 
20110109181609.000|20110109181610.000|TR0|for us, particularly when it results in 
20110109181610.000|20110109181612.000|TR0|what would be lone wolves or lone 
20110109181612.000|20110109181614.000|TR0|offenders undertaking attacks.
20110109181614.000|20110109181616.000|TR0|
20110109181616.000|20110109181618.000|TR0|And let me see, yes, right here in black
